sentences.en: A British businessman who can speak a foreign language is still something of a novelty.
sentences.cn: 能说某种外语的英国商人仍算是新奇人物.

sentences.en: Fiber optics have even been adopted by novelty makers for table decorations.
sentences.cn: 纤维光学甚至被一些喜欢制作新奇事物的人用作桌子的装饰.

sentences.en: For many the philosophy was merely a fashion, and the novelty soon wore off.
sentences.cn: 对许多人来说哲学只是一种时髦罢了，不久就没新鲜感了。

sentences.en: Having a mid-morning party certainly adds novelty value.
sentences.cn: 在上午10点左右开派对一定会增加新鲜感。

sentences.en: He knew that this French world was not a novelty to her.
sentences.cn: 他知道,法国对于她来说已经不是个新奇的地方了.

sentences.en: It came from the days when a motor car was a novelty.
sentences.cn: 这要从轿车还是新鲜玩意儿那会儿说起。

sentences.en: It was fun for a while, but the novelty wore off (= it became boring ).
sentences.cn: 开始有一阵很好玩，可是新鲜感随后便消失了。

sentences.en: It was quite a novelty to spend my holidays working on a boat.
sentences.cn: 在船上工作来度过我的假期是件相当新奇的事.

sentences.en: It's a bore to be sick, and the novelty of lying in bed all day wears off quickly.
sentences.cn: 生病是件烦人的事，整天躺在床上的新鲜劲很快就没了。

sentences.en: Many toys have no attraction beyond their novelty value.
sentences.cn: 许多玩具除了有些新奇感之外，别无吸引力。

sentences.en: My mother bought a novelty pen for me.
sentences.cn: 我妈给我买了一支新颖的笔.

sentences.en: Nowadays novelists aim at novelty either in subject or in style, instead of following the beaten path of conventionality.
sentences.cn: 近来,小说家在题材上或文体上追求新奇而不走传统老路.

sentences.en: Seeing people queuing for food was a novelty.
sentences.cn: 看到人们排队买食品是件新鲜事。

sentences.en: The drive - in movie was a novelty to her, and she enjoyed it.
sentences.cn: "免下车"电影对她来讲是件新奇事, 她很喜欢看.

sentences.en: The novelty of the situation intrigued him.
sentences.cn: 周围环境的独具一格令他着迷。

sentences.en: Then the Internet was still something of a novelty.
sentences.cn: 那时因特网还是个挺新鲜的东西。

sentences.en: There may well have been a piquant novelty about her books when they came out.
sentences.cn: 她的书问世时可能确有引人入胜的新颖之处。

sentences.en: There's a certain novelty value in this approach.
sentences.cn: 这种方法有一定的新意。

words.tran_cn: 契约的代替；用新事物代替
变化,更新,新鲜事物,新词

trans.tran_cn: 新奇，新奇的事物，新颖小巧而价廉的物品
trans.tran_en: the quality of being new, unusual, and interesting
